1396420.name: Rugby Union Team Manager 3 DLC “The International Teams and Competitions. Plus extra French Teams and Division”
1396420.description:
International Teams and Competitions Update Plus Extra French Teams and Division

This DLC features a full upgrade for Rugby Union Team Manager 3.
This update includes 4 New International Competitions, 20 New International Teams and a new French Division.

4 New International Competitions


  • November Internationals.
  • Northern AND Southern Hemisphere Nations.
  • Nations Cup at the end of the season.

20 New International Teams

Featuring nations around the globe.

A new French division 3 including 48 new clubs entering 4 pools with play offs, forming a 3rd tier of promotion / relegation
for the French domestic leagues.


If you purchase the International Competitions and Teams DLC update, but still wish to play with your old saved games,
please right click the game in the library and select Properties, then the DLC tab, then untick the Installed checkbox. To switch back to play
with Rugby Union Team Manager 3 with the DLC, then please just tick the Installed checkbox.

Please note your saved games created without the DLC will not work with the DLC, and any saved games created whilst playing
with the DLC will not work or show up with the non-updated game

Also note:-
When you right click the game in the library, select Properties, then tick or untick the Installed check box in the DLC tab, it activates a download update.
So each time you tick or untick the Installed checkbox, you have to wait for the update to download.
